reasoning: The user has a SAN (Statement of Authority) and Client Acceptance (CA), but wants to open a job. According to the guide, opening a job requires a SAN, a signed Engagement Letter (EL), and an Engagement Acceptance (EA). While the user already has a SAN and CA, they lack a signed EL and the EA. Since EA can be performed once CA is available, the user should first obtain a signed EL, then complete the EA, and finally open the job. These are the actionable steps.
